meanings.definition: A state of boredom or lack of excitement.
meanings.sent1: She fell into the humdrums of a rainy day with nothing to do.
meanings.sent2: The humdrums of waiting in line at the DMV were excruciating.
meanings.sent3: In the humdrums of a quiet afternoon, she decided to rearrange her bookshelf.
meanings.sent4: The humdrums of the small town made him long for adventure.
meanings.sent5: The humdrums of the empty room echoed with silence.
